<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Publish Event"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/collaboration-spaces/{spaceId}/event"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Publish an event to the confidential environment of the collaboration space.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"spaceId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"The ID of the collaboration space to handle the event."},{"in":"query","name":"stream","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":false,"default":"events","description":"The stream to add the event to."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The event to handle.","name":"event","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string"}},"required":["type"],"additionalProperties":true}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The ID of the event that has been published.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"messageId":{"type":"string"}},"required":["messageId"]}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error_message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error_message"]}}}},"401":{"description":"User is not authenticated","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error_message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error_message"]}}}},"404":{"description":"Resource not found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error_message":{"type":"string","default":"Document not found"}},"required":["error_message"]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
